API Reference¶

utils_mix.add_numbers(num1, num2)[source]¶

Add two numbers together.

This function takes two numeric arguments, num1 and num2, and returns their sum.

Parameters:

num1 (int or float): The first number to be added. num2 (int or float): The second number to be added.

Returns:

float: The sum of num1 and num2.

utils_mix.greet(name)[source]¶

Greet a person.

This function takes a string argument name and returns a greeting message.

Parameters:

name (str): The name of the person to greet.

Returns:

str: A greeting message with the person’s name.

utils_mix.multiply_numbers(num1, num2)[source]¶

Multiply two numbers.

This function takes two numeric arguments, num1 and num2, and returns their product.

Parameters:

num1 (int or float): The first number to be multiplied. num2 (int or float): The second number to be multiplied.

Returns:

float: The product of num1 and num2.
